H0.text: By what name was Peggy Hookham DBE better known. Markova

H1.text: By what name was Peggy Hookham DBE better known. Parkinson

H2.text: By what name was Peggy Hookham DBE better known. Ashton

H3.text: By what name was Peggy Hookham DBE better known. Fonteyn

A4.text: She took the name by which she was known for the remainder of her professional life, 'Margot Fonteyn', modifying her maternal grandfather's surname, 'Fontes' â€” in Portuguese, 'fonte' means 'fountain'.

A5.text: Her brother, Felix, who became a specialist of dance photography, eventually adopted the same surname.
